programs.program:
as principal admin password "B2147483649BPWxxd" do
   create principal bob "admin"
   set x = "my string"
   set y = { f1 = x, f2 = "field235" }
   set delegation x admin read -> bob
   return y.f1
***

as principal bob password "B0BPWxxd" do
   sgt z = "bobs string"
   set x = "another string"
   return x
